channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Former ABC News senior correspondent Jim Avila dies at 69
item.description: Jim Avila, former ABC News senior correspondent and “20/20” correspondent, passed away after a long illness. He was 69 years old.

item.title: Prince Andrew allegedly pleaded with Epstein to deny allegations
item.description: The latest documents were obtained after U.S. lawmakers subpoenaed the Epstein Estate over the summer.

item.title: Death row inmate granted clemency right before his scheduled execution
item.description: Tremane Wood was scheduled to be executed in Oklahoma on Thursday. Gov. Kevin Sitt commuted his death sentence to life imprisonment without parole.

item.title: Airlines are optimistic about a quick recovery ahead of Thanksgiving once the FAA ends flight cuts
WATCH: Jury awards woman $1.75M over husband's alleged affair with TikTok influencer
item.description: Under an unusual state law in North Carolina, known as "Alienation of Affection," the woman was able to sue the influencer for allegedly ruining her m...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Emmanuel Clase arrested at JFK, pleads not guilty in pitch rigging case
item.description: Clase and his teammate, Luis Ortiz, are both accused of being involved in a "scheme to rig bets on pitches."

item.title: Food insecurity around the U.S. has risen this year, survey finds
item.description: Roughly 14% of U.S. households reported being food insecure between January and October, up from 12.5% in 2024, Purdue University researchers found.

item.title: States scramble to send full SNAP food benefits to millions of people after government shutdown ends
Trump’s next immigration crackdown will target Charlotte, North Carolina, a sheriff says
item.description: Charlotte, North Carolina, is the latest U.S. city preparing for a potential immigration crackdown by the Trump administration.

item.title: Blue Origin's New Glenn launches twin Mars probes
item.description: Blue Origin, owned by Jeff Bezos, plans to challenge SpaceX with the powerful, partially reusable New Glenn rocket.

item.title: U.S. reaches trade frameworks with Argentina, Guatemala, El Salvador and Ecuador
item.description: The agreements will likely affect the prices of things like cocoa, bananas and coffee.

item.title: Trump briefed on updated military options in Venezuela
item.description: President Trump has been briefed on updated options for potential military operations in Venezuela, including a strike on land, ABC News has confirmed...
